name: HireMatch
description: We are changing the job market. We believe that the best candidates come from recommendations. That is why we have created a crowd staffing recruitment model that is unique on the market and based on an international community of HR experts. Our process allows us to source matched candidates faster than agencies operating under traditional models.
Headline: We help job seekers find their perfect match
ShortDescription: Remove the barriers to growth by scaling your team fast with top-notch United States IT talent

Highlights.name: Get in touch
Highlights.description: Tell us all about your project and the profiles you’re looking for and our staffing team will begin a search right away.

Highlights.name: Meet your team
Highlights.description: After we find you some potential teammates, it’s time to see for yourself who all is a fit.

Highlights.name: Hassle-free nearshoring
Highlights.description: Collaborate and let your nearsure team become fully integrated with yours to achieve your goals.

enhanced_description: HireMatch offers a unique crowd staffing recruitment model, leveraging an international community of HR experts to source matched candidates faster than traditional agencies. This approach is designed to help companies quickly scale their teams, particularly with top-notch IT talent from the United States, thereby removing barriers to growth and filling open positions more quickly. The process involves submitting project requirements, receiving potential candidate matches, and facilitating the seamless integration of new nearsure team members.
